document.full_text: in his third letter to the united states president, the libyan leader offered fatherly affection and idiosyncratic spellings, but drew a swift rejection from the state department.
document.title: qaddafi writes to obama, urging end to airstrikes
lines_and_colors: in his third letter to the united states president, the libyan leader offered fatherly affection and idiosyncratic spellings, but drew a swift rejection from the state department.
